pages.general_notes_verbatim:

ACCESS TO CHAMBER WILL BE VIA A REMOVABLE LADDER
NOTE:

pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides a mixed set of drawings including a plan view, various elevations, and a section detail for a storm tank access hatch. It includes detailed views of the frame and concrete opening, with notes on site verification and access. The drawings are primarily related to site-level construction and detail the structural components necessary for the installation.
